titles.title: VA Home Loan GRACE Act of 2025
VA Home Loan GRACE Act of 2025
Veteran Affairs Home Loan Guaranty Resiliency And Concurrency Enhancement Act of 2025

To amend title 38, United States Code, to increase the maximum guaranty amount for loans made to certain veterans under the laws administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
